title: Mayahem Temple
description: Depending on whether the category you're running does GGM Early, Mayahem Temple will come either first or a bit later on in the run after GGM.

general.name: Jade Snake Grove Early
general.description: You can enter Jade Snake Grove without Golden Goliath by flying underneath the overhanging leaves and beak bombing into a gap to enter the loading zone.

general.name: Pillars
general.description: The pillars can be scaled with some carefully timed jumps, flutters, and beak busts, to skip needing to hit the columns below.

general.name: Prison Compound Codes
general.description: The Prison Compound is opened with one of three randomly generated codes. This video showcases all three possibilites.

general.name: Relic Jump
general.description: Targitzan's relic can be stolen without needing to tiptoe across the sticks, which saves a lot of time.

general.name: Stadium Early
general.description: The Mayan Kickball stadium can be entered without transforming into the Stony. This requires a precise beak bomb above the guard's head, into the loading zone.

cwkshots.name: Swamp Jiggy Shot
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a clockwork to grab the Jiggy at the end of the swamp, without needing to wade across the swamp with the boots.

cwkshots.name: Pillars Shots
cwkshots.description: This video showcases the different clockwork shots to obtain the Jiggy on top of the pillars.

cwkwarps.name: Snake Head Skip
cwkwarps.description: One of the more difficult tricks in Mayahem Temple. You can warp into the Treasure Chamber by shooting a clockwork into a crack in the door at the top of the building.
